weapons.name: Shortsword
weapons.description: A short, versatile blade favored by rogues

weapons.name: Longsword
weapons.description: A reliable steel blade

weapons.name: Quarterstaff
weapons.description: A simple wooden staff

weapons.name: Shortbow
weapons.description: A small bow used for hunting and skirmishing

weapons.name: Longbow
weapons.description: A large bow with great range

weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.description: A simple blade, easily concealed

weapons.name: Handaxe
weapons.description: A small axe for throwing or close combat

weapons.name: Javelin
weapons.description: A light spear designed for throwing

weapons.name: Mace
weapons.description: A heavy metal head on a wooden shaft

weapons.name: Greataxe
weapons.description: A massive two-handed axe that cleaves through armor

weapons.name: Greatsword
weapons.description: A massive blade requiring both hands to wield

weapons.name: Battleaxe
weapons.description: A sturdy axe designed for warfare

weapons.name: Warhammer
weapons.description: A hammer built for combat, capable of crushing armor

weapons.name: Rapier
weapons.description: A thin, elegant blade perfect for thrusting attacks

weapons.name: Scimitar
weapons.description: A curved blade favored by swashbucklers

weapons.name: Flail
weapons.description: A spiked ball on a chain, difficult to parry

weapons.name: Morningstar
weapons.description: A spiked mace that deals devastating wounds

weapons.name: Halberd
weapons.description: A polearm combining an axe blade with a spear point

weapons.name: Glaive
weapons.description: A long-handled blade for sweeping attacks

weapons.name: Pike
weapons.description: A very long spear used to keep enemies at bay

weapons.name: Light Crossbow
weapons.description: A simple crossbow, easy to use

weapons.name: Heavy Crossbow
weapons.description: A powerful crossbow with devastating force

weapons.name: Hand Crossbow
weapons.description: A small crossbow that can be wielded in one hand

weapons.name: Trident
weapons.description: A three-pronged spear associated with the sea

weapons.name: Whip
weapons.description: A flexible weapon with significant reach

weapons.name: Flame Tongue
weapons.description: This magic sword bursts into flame on command. While ablaze, it deals an extra 2d6 fire damage to any target it hits.

weapons.name: Frost Brand
weapons.description: When you hit with this magic sword, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage. While you hold the sword, you have resistance to fire damage.

weapons.name: Vorpal Sword
weapons.description: This legendary blade can sever heads. When you roll a 20 on an attack roll, you cut off one of the creature's heads if it has one.

weapons.name: Holy Avenger
weapons.description: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls. When you hit a fiend or undead, it takes an extra 2d10 radiant damage. While you hold this sword, you and friendly creatures within 10 feet have advantage on saving throws against spells.

weapons.name: Oathbow
weapons.description: When you nock an arrow and whisper "Swift death to you who have wronged me," the target becomes your sworn enemy until it dies. You have advantage on attack rolls against the target.

weapons.name: Sun Blade
weapons.description: This radiant blade deals 1d8 radiant damage plus 1d8 extra to undead. While grasped, the blade can be activated, emitting bright sunlight.

weapons.name: Dagger of Venom
weapons.description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls. You can use an action to cause thick, black poison to coat the blade. The poison remains for 1 minute or until an attack using this weapon hits a creature.

armor.name: Padded Armor
armor.description: Quilted layers of cloth and batting

armor.name: Leather Armor
armor.description: Light, flexible leather armor

armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
armor.description: Leather armor reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes

armor.name: Hide Armor
armor.description: Crude armor of thick furs and pelts

armor.name: Chain Shirt
armor.description: Interlocking metal rings worn between layers of clothing

armor.name: Scale Mail
armor.description: A coat and leggings covered with overlapping metal scales

armor.name: Breastplate
armor.description: A fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather

armor.name: Half Plate
armor.description: Shaped metal plates covering most of the body

armor.name: Ring Mail
armor.description: Leather armor with heavy rings sewn into it

armor.name: Chain Mail
armor.description: Heavy metal rings woven together

armor.name: Splint Armor
armor.description: Vertical strips of metal riveted to a leather backing

armor.name: Plate Armor
armor.description: Shaped, interlocking metal plates covering the entire body

armor.name: Shield
armor.description: A wooden or metal shield strapped to the arm

armor.name: Adamantine Armor
armor.description: This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine. While you're wearing it, any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit.

armor.name: Mithral Chain Shirt
armor.description: Mithral is a light, flexible metal. This armor can be worn under normal clothes. It doesn't impose disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

armor.name: Armor of Resistance
armor.description: While wearing this armor, you have resistance to one type of damage. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly.

armor.name: Armor of Invulnerability
armor.description: You have resistance to nonmagical damage while you wear this armor. You can use an action to make yourself immune to nonmagical damage for 10 minutes.

armor.name: Dragon Scale Mail
armor.description: Made of the scales of a dragon. You have resistance to the damage type associated with the dragon's breath weapon, advantage on saving throws against dragon Frightful Presence and breath weapons.

armor.name: +1 Shield
armor.description: While holding this shield, you have a +1 bonus to AC in addition to the shield's normal bonus.

armor.name: +2 Shield
armor.description: While holding this shield, you have a +2 bonus to AC in addition to the shield's normal bonus.

armor.name: Animated Shield
armor.description: While holding this shield, you can speak its command word to cause it to animate. The shield floats in your space, leaving your hands free.

armor.name: Spellguard Shield
armor.description: While holding this shield, you have advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects, and spell attacks have disadvantage against you.

magicItems.name: Bag of Holding
magicItems.description: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions.

magicItems.name: Boots of Elvenkind
magicItems.description: While you wear these boots, your steps make no sound. You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

magicItems.name: Ring of Protection
magicItems.description: You have a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

magicItems.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
magicItems.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the magic missile spell from it.

magicItems.name: Cloak of Displacement
magicItems.description: While you wear this cloak, it projects an illusion that makes you appear to be standing in a place near your actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

magicItems.name: Cloak of Invisibility
magicItems.description: While wearing this cloak, you can pull its hood over your head to cause yourself to become invisible. While you are invisible, anything you are carrying or wearing is invisible with you.

magicItems.name: Cloak of Protection
magicItems.description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wear this cloak.

magicItems.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
magicItems.description: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect on you if your Strength is already 19 or higher.

magicItems.name: Belt of Hill Giant Strength
magicItems.description: While wearing this belt, your Strength score changes to 21. If your Strength is already equal to or greater than the belt's score, the item has no effect on you.

magicItems.name: Belt of Fire Giant Strength
magicItems.description: While wearing this belt, your Strength score changes to 25.

magicItems.name: Belt of Storm Giant Strength
magicItems.description: While wearing this belt, your Strength score changes to 29.

magicItems.name: Amulet of Health
magicItems.description: Your Constitution score is 19 while you wear this amulet. It has no effect on you if your Constitution is already 19 or higher.

magicItems.name: Headband of Intellect
magicItems.description: Your Intelligence score is 19 while you wear this headband. It has no effect on you if your Intelligence is already 19 or higher.

magicItems.name: Eyes of the Eagle
magicItems.description: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

magicItems.name: Bracers of Defense
magicItems.description: While wearing these bracers, you gain a +2 bonus to AC if you are wearing no armor and using no shield.

magicItems.name: Bracers of Archery
magicItems.description: While wearing these bracers, you have proficiency with the longbow and shortbow, and you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls on ranged attacks made with such weapons.

magicItems.name: Ring of Spell Storing
magicItems.description: This ring stores spells cast into it, holding them until the attuned wearer uses them. The ring can store up to 5 levels worth of spells at a time.

magicItems.name: Ring of Invisibility
magicItems.description: While wearing this ring, you can turn invisible as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible with you.

magicItems.name: Ring of Regeneration
magicItems.description: While wearing this ring, you regain 1d6 hit points every 10 minutes, provided you have at least 1 hit point. If you lose a body part, the ring causes the missing part to regrow and return to full functionality after 1d6 + 1 days.

magicItems.name: Ioun Stone of Protection
magicItems.description: This dusty rose prism orbits your head. You gain a +1 bonus to AC while this stone orbits your head.

magicItems.name: Ioun Stone of Mastery
magicItems.description: This pale green prism increases your proficiency bonus by 1 while it orbits your head.

magicItems.name: Portable Hole
magicItems.description: This fine black cloth, soft as silk, is folded up to the dimensions of a handkerchief. It unfolds into a circular sheet 6 feet in diameter. You can use an action to unfold a portable hole and place it on or against a solid surface, whereupon the portable hole creates an extradimensional hole 10 feet deep.

magicItems.name: Immovable Rod
magicItems.description: This flat iron rod has a button on one end. You can use an action to press the button, which causes the rod to become magically fixed in place, defying gravity.

magicItems.name: Deck of Many Things
magicItems.description: Usually found in a box or pouch, this deck contains a number of cards made of ivory or vellum. Most (75 percent) of these decks have only thirteen cards, but the rest have twenty-two. Drawing cards can grant great power or bring ruin.

magicItems.name: Staff of Power
magicItems.description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls. It has 20 charges for various powerful spells.

magicItems.name: Staff of Fire
magicItems.description: You have resistance to fire damage while you hold this staff. The staff has 10 charges for casting fire spells.

magicItems.name: Staff of the Magi
magicItems.description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls. While you hold it, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls. The staff has 50 charges for casting incredibly powerful spells.

magicItems.name: Wand of Fireballs
magicItems.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the fireball spell (save DC 15) from it.

magicItems.name: Wand of Lightning Bolts
magicItems.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the lightning bolt spell (save DC 15) from it.

magicItems.name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
magicItems.description: While wearing this amulet, you are hidden from divination magic. You can't be targeted by such magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

magicItems.name: Cape of the Mountebank
magicItems.description: This cape smells faintly of brimstone. While wearing it, you can use it to cast the dimension door spell as an action. This property of the cape can't be used again until the next dawn.

magicItems.name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
magicItems.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells while you wear this cloak.

magicItems.name: Pearl of Power
magicItems.description: While this pearl is on your person, you can use an action to speak its command word and regain one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower. Once you use the pearl, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

magicItems.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper +1
magicItems.description: While holding this rod, you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your warlock spells. You can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod.

magicItems.name: Winged Boots
magicItems.description: While you wear these boots, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. You can use the boots to fly for up to 4 hours.

magicItems.name: Gloves of Thievery
magicItems.description: These gloves are invisible while worn. While wearing them, you gain a +5 bonus to Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks and Dexterity checks made to pick locks.

magicItems.name: Helm of Telepathy
magicItems.description: While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast the detect thoughts spell (save DC 13) from it. You can also use telepathy to speak mentally to any creature you can see within 30 feet.

magicItems.name: Periapt of Wound Closure
magicItems.description: While you wear this pendant, you stabilize whenever you are dying at the start of your turn. In addition, whenever you roll a Hit Die to regain hit points, double the number of hit points it restores.

potions.name: Potion of Invisibility
potions.description: This potion's container looks empty but feels weightless. When you drink it, you become invisible for 1 hour. Anything you wear or carry is invisible with you. The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

potions.name: Potion of Speed
potions.description: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the haste spell for 1 minute (no concentration required).

scrolls.name: Spell Scroll (Fireball)
scrolls.description: A scroll containing the Fireball spell. It can be cast without expending a slot.

scrolls.name: Spell Scroll (Detect Magic)
scrolls.description: A scroll containing Detect Magic. Can be cast without a slot.

scrolls.name: Spell Scroll (Healing Word)
scrolls.description: A scroll containing Healing Word. Casts without a slot.

treasure.name: Adventurer's Rope
treasure.description: 50 feet of sturdy rope, useful for climbing or securing gear

treasure.name: Torch Oil
treasure.description: A flask of oil that fuels torches and lanterns

treasure.name: Lucky Shield Emblem
treasure.description: A polished emblem blessed for protection

treasure.name: Silver Luck Charm
treasure.description: A delicate charm said to bring fortune to the wearer

treasure.name: Marked Courier Map
treasure.description: A weathered map with a fresh charcoal route drawn toward the Azure Spire and a note to deliver it to Spymaster Kaela
